chunks.content: The girls auditioned before record labels and were finally signed to Elektra Records, moving to Atlanta Records briefly to work on their first recording, only to be cut by the company.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly mentions the record company that first signed Beyoncé's group (Elektra Records) and states that they were later cut by the company.
metadata.answer_contribution: Identifies Elektra Records as the record company that signed and then cut Beyoncé's group.

required_info: details about the signing and cutting
